Class Gui

java.lang.Object
Gui
public class Gui extends Object
Manages the graphical user interface for the Plants Vs. Zombies game. This includes setting up the main window, displaying different game panels (main menu, game board, game over screen), and loading visual assets.
Since:
2025-07-30

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Gui()
    Constructs the GUI, initializing screen dimensions, loading animations, creating buttons, and setting up the main frame.

  • Constructor Details

    • Gui

      public Gui()
      Constructs the GUI, initializing screen dimensions, loading animations, creating buttons, and setting up the main frame.

  • Method Details

    • initializeAnimations

      public void initializeAnimations(AnimationManager animations)
      Loads all necessary game animations and images using the provided AnimationManager. This includes environment tiles, UI icons, and character animations for plants and zombies.
      Parameters:
      animations - The AnimationManager instance to load assets into.

    • initializeGui

      public void initializeGui()
      Initializes the main JFrame and sets up the initial game panels. Sets the frame properties and displays the main menu.

    • initializeMainMenu

      public void initializeMainMenu(JFrame frame)
      Initializes the main menu panel, including its background and layout. Adds level selection buttons and an exit button.
      Parameters:
      frame - The main JFrame to add the panel to.

    • initializeGameOverScreen

      public void initializeGameOverScreen(JFrame frame, boolean didPlayerWin, int level)
      Initializes the game over screen panel, displaying either a win message or a game over image, along with relevant action buttons.
      Parameters:
      frame - The main JFrame to add the panel to.
      didPlayerWin - true if the player won the level, false otherwise.
      level - The level that was just completed.

    • getButton

      public JButton getButton(String button)
      Retrieves a specific JButton instance by its name.
      Parameters:
      button - The string name of the button to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The requested JButton, or null if not found.

    • updatePlantSelectionPanel

      public void updatePlantSelectionPanel(int level)
      Updates the plant selection panel for a new game level. Creates a new PlantSelectionPanel instance with the specified level.
      Parameters:
      level - The new game level.

    • showGameUI

      public void showGameUI()
      Displays the main game UI, including the plant selection panel and the board panel. Removes any existing panels from the frame before adding the game UI.

    • showMainMenuPanel

      public void showMainMenuPanel()
      Displays the main menu panel. Removes any existing panels from the frame before showing the main menu.

    • showGameOverPanel

      public void showGameOverPanel(boolean didPlayerWin, int level)
      Displays the game over screen. Initializes the game over panel based on win/loss status and then displays it.
      Parameters:
      didPlayerWin - true if the player won, false if lost.
      level - The level that was just played.

    • getPlantSelectionPanel

      public PlantSelectionPanel getPlantSelectionPanel()
      Retrieves the PlantSelectionPanel instance.
      Returns:
      The plant selection panel.

    • getBoardPanel

      public BoardPanel getBoardPanel()
      Retrieves the BoardPanel instance.
      Returns:
      The board panel.
